references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in the field of point cloud analysis, introducing the PointNet architecture which is widely used and extended upon.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: This paper extends the PointNet architecture to handle larger and more complex point clouds, introducing hierarchical feature learning.

references.paper_title: Masked discrimination for self-supervised learning on point clouds
references.reason: This paper introduces a self-supervised learning method for point clouds, which is highly influential in the field, and is directly compared to in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, which is the core architecture upon which the current paper is built.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders for point cloud self-supervised learning
references.reason: This paper is another highly influential self-supervised learning paper for point clouds, directly compared to in the current paper.
